summary:
This Mod adds New NPCs and their house in Riverwood.
New NPCs are sisters,Erina and Krena.
descriptionHtml:
Erina New NPC and House
--------------------------------------------------------------

Require:Hair Pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3809

I am Japanese.
Because I am not good at english, I can not do enough to support you.

This Mod adds New NPCs and their house in Riverwood.
New NPCs are sisters,Erina and Krena.

Erina can be your follower.
She is a spellsword that specializes in Conjuration.
She will not die.

Krena is a misc merchant.
She is able to sell for 24 hours.
But she may sleep from 22:00, then you wake her.

Erina\'s House, you can freely use it.
Storages such as chests are not respawned.
In and out of this house, have all the crafting kit.

Bug:
Navmesh near the bridge does not make good, the followers cannot come after you for occasionally.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Note:
They are New Race (Non Playable).
Including (File path is different from vanilla),
The face Mod \"univision Face\" by DD AKT, \"RANs FaceGen\" by RAN46, and my \"femalehead.dds\".
The Body Mod \"DIMONIZED UNP female body\" by dimon99, \"FemFeet\" by Phygit, and \"X106 skeleton_female.nif\" by tktk.

If you want to change the Body Mod, you replace the files in this folder.

Erina is RaceA.

Meshes
Data\\meshes\\SumNPC\\RaceA\\
 femalebody_0.nif
 femalebody_1.nif
 femalefeet_0.nif
 femalefeet_1.nif
 femalehands_0.nif
 femalehands_1.nif
 skeleton_female.nif (if you use the BBP body or apparel)

Textures
Data\\textures\\SumNPC\\RaceA\\
 femalebody_1.dds
 femalebody_1_msn.dds
 femalebody_1_s.dds
 femalebody_1_sk.dds
 femalehands_1.dds
 femalehands_1_msn.dds
 femalehands_1_s.dds
 femalehands_1_sk.dds

Krena is RaceB.

Meshes
Data\\meshes\\SumNPC\\RaceB\\
 femalebody_0.nif
 femalebody_1.nif
 femalefeet_0.nif
 femalefeet_1.nif
 femalehands_0.nif
 femalehands_1.nif

 ...Don\'t change skeleton_female.nif

Textures
Data\\textures\\SumNPC\\RaceB\\
 femalebody_1.dds
 femalebody_1_msn.dds
 femalebody_1_s.dds
 femalebody_1_sk.dds
 femalehands_1.dds
 femalehands_1_msn.dds
 femalehands_1_s.dds
 femalehands_1_sk.dds
 
Caution:
There are vanilla and X106 Skeleton_female.nif.
If You dress her using the BBP(Breast & Butt Physics) apparel, then The CTD.
But don\'t change Krena\'s X106 Skeleton, because she becomes large.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Change log:
2012.06.13 ver1.1 Fixed the face discoloration. 
2012.06.10 ver1.0 Released.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
\"univision Face\" by DD AKT
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569

\"RANs FaceGen\" by RAN46
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12944

\"Enhanced Character Edit\" by tktk
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951

\"DIMONIZED UNP female body\" by dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

\"FemFeet\" by Phygit
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666

Thanks!!
author: Sumner
